name: Humongous Fungus (Liam de Valmency)
description:
Be the best fungus you can be.

Humongous Fungus is a third-person arcade sandbox in which you must grow and control your roots as they creep, climb, and twist around the environment, absorbing the nutrients of everything they can find in a quest to grow and make your mushroom the dominant lifeform in the region.

Controls:

A/D: Turn
Arrow keys: Rotate camera, Open/close shop
Space: Spawn new root
Mouse: Purchase upgrades

Credits:

Made for Guildford Global Game Jam 2023.

Code - Liam de Valmency
Art - Lewis Thompson
Sound - Kevin Davey + Lewis Ball
Music - Alyx Jones
